text: Pré-en-Pail-Saint-Samson is a commune of 2,331 people (2017). It is found in the region Pays de la Loire in the Mayenne department in the northwest of France. The municipality was created on 1 January 2016 and consists of the former communes of Pré-en-Pail (the seat) and Saint-Samson.Arrêté préfectoral 4 December 2015 == References == Category:2016 establishments in France Category:Communes in Mayenne
title: Pré-en-Pail-Saint-Samson
